Functions for Data Wrangling

```{r}
addByString <- function(bigFrame, newFrame, string){
  bigFrame <- bigFrame %>% 
  inner_join(newFrame, by = string)
}


tractToInt <- function(frame){
  frame <- frame %>% 
    mutate(tract = as.integer(as.character(tract)))
}

```
